data.eml:eml: Three new species of Atopsyche Banks (Trichoptera, Hydrobiosidae) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Santos, Allan P. M., Holzenthal, Ralph W. (2012): Three new species of Atopsyche Banks (Trichoptera, Hydrobiosidae) from Brazil. ZooKeys 207: 65-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.207.3419, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.207.3419
